CustomField.description: Assign a graphic rating [stars] based on Bid Quality Score
CustomField.formula: IMAGE( IF( Hidden_Bid_Quality_Score__c >=95, "/img/samples/stars_500.gif", IF( Hidden_Bid_Quality_Score__c >=85, "/img/samples/stars_400.gif", IF( Hidden_Bid_Quality_Score__c >=65, "/img/samples/stars_300.gif", IF( Hidden_Bid_Quality_Score__c >=45, "/img/samples/stars_200.gif", IF( Hidden_Bid_Quality_Score__c >=30, "/img/samples/stars_100.gif", "/img/samples/stars_000.gif"))))),"Bid Quality Rating")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Based on Bid Quality Score: 5 stars = 95 or greater 4 stars = 85 or greater 3 stars = 65 or greater 2 stars = 45 or greater 1 star = 30 or greater
CustomField.label: Bid Quality Rating
